src_original: Āps 45. brahmakāyikānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām ardhakalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, (GBM 1701.5)
tgt_original: 「梵眾天中壽命半劫，此後命終。

src_original: asty antareṇa kālakriyā.  Āps 46. brahmapurohitānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ kalpa āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 苾芻應知，梵輔天中壽命一劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 47. mahābrahmāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānām adhyardhakalpa //  addhyardhakalpa//  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 大梵天中壽命一劫半，然後命終。

src_original: Āps 48. parīttābhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dvau kalpāv āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam. asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 苾芻應知，少光天中壽命二劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 49. apramāṇābhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ (GBM 1701.7)  catvāraḥ kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 無量光天壽命四劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 50. ābhāsvarāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aṣṭau kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 極光淨天壽命八劫，然後命終。

src_original: Āps 51. parīttāśubhānāṃ (GBM 1700.1)  bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣoḍaśa kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 苾芻應知，少靜天中壽命十六劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 52. apraṃāṇaśubhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dvātriṃśat kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
tgt_original: 若無量靜天壽命三十二劫，然後命終；

src_original: asty antareṇa kālakriyā.  Āps 53. (GBM 1700.2) śubhakṛtsnānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ kalpā āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
tgt_original: 若遍靜天壽命六十四劫，然後命終。

src_original: asty antareṇa kālakriyā.  Āps 54. anabhrakāṇāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ paṃcaviṃśaty adhikaṃ kalpaśatam āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam, asty (GBM 1700.3)
tgt_original: 苾芻應知，若無雲天壽命一百二十五劫，此後命終；

src_original: antareṇa kālakriyā.  Āps 55. puṇyaprasavānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām ardhatritīyāni kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.  Āps 56. bṛhatphalānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ (GBM 1700.4)  paṃca kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 若福生天壽命二百五十劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 57. tathaivāsaṃjñāsatvānāṃ paṃca kalpaśatāny āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
tgt_original: 若廣果天壽命五百劫，然後命終；

src_original: asty antareṇa kālakriyā.  Āps 58. abṛhānāṃ (GBM 1700.5)  bhikṣavo devānāṃ kalpasahasram āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 苾芻應知，若無煩天壽命一千劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 59. atapānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ dve kalpasahasre āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa (GBM 1700.6) kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 無熱天中壽命二千劫，然後命終。

src_original: Āps 60. sudṛśānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catvāri kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 苾芻應知，善現天中壽命四千劫，此後命終；

src_original: Āps 61. sudarśanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aṣṭau kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ (GBM 1700.7)  pramāṇam, asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 若善見天壽命八千劫，此後命終；

src_original: Āps 62. akaniṣṭhānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣoḍaśa kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 若色究竟天壽命一萬六千劫，然後命終。

src_original: Āps 63. ākāśānantyāyatanopagānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ viṃśatiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 「苾芻應知，空無邊處有情壽命二萬大劫，然後命終；

src_original: Āps 64. vijñānānantyāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ catvāriṃśat kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 識無邊處壽命四萬大劫，此後命終；

src_original: Āps 65. ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānāṃ ṣaṣṭiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,  asty antareṇa kālakriyā.
tgt_original: 無所有處壽命六萬大劫，此後命終；

src_original: Āps 66. naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ bhikṣavo devānām aśītiḥ kalpasahasrāṇy āyuṣaḥ pramāṇam,
tgt_original: 若非想非非想處有情壽命八萬大劫，然後命終。
